semantic_issues: The Borrow class is not associated with the Book class in a way that reflects the borrowing relationship.
The Borrow class should have a direct association with the User class to indicate which user borrowed which book.
recommendations: Add an association from the Borrow class to the Book class to represent that a Borrow instance is linked to a specific Book.
Add an association from the Borrow class to the User class to represent that a Borrow instance is linked to a specific User.
Consider renaming the Borrow class to Borrowing to better reflect its purpose.
